name: diagnovet-challenge
description: Sistema de Gestión de Reportes Veterinarios con IA

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:push: cd backend && npx prisma db push
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:shared

author: Marcos Nicolás Chiacchio
